author: kevaundray
content:
For those that wanted to give feedback on the bandwidth requirements for validators, it is here: <https://hackmd.io/@kevaundray/S1AjGt241x>

It is split into two sections:

- The need for inclusion lists and how it affects our reliance on local block building for censorship resistance

- The bandwidth suggestions plus citations on fibre optic development, and median/average bandwidth speeds in certain countries and globally
